statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity), MIN(wind_speed) FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp='2022-01-01';
SELECT timestamp, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation IS NOT NULL AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY humidity DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, SUM(precipitation) AS total_precipitation FROM weather_data
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature > 25.0
SELECT Date, Temperature, Humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE Humidity < 50
SELECT Temperature, Humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE Date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT Date, WindSpeed FROM WeatherData WHERE WindSpeed >= 10.0 ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT Date, WeatherCondition FROM FlightConditions WHERE WindSpeedLimit < 15.0
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature > 25 ORDER BY Date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT WeatherCondition, Temperature FROM FlightConditions WHERE TemperatureLimit < 20 AND WindSpeedLimit < 10
SELECT Date, Humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE Humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY Humidity ASC
SELECT Date, WindSpeed FROM WeatherData WHERE WindSpeed > 15 AND Temperature < 30
SELECT Date, Temperature, WindSpeed FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature < 20 OR Humidity > 80
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data;
SELECT Temperature, Humidity FROM Weather_Data WHERE Temperature > 25;
SELECT Date, Wind_Speed FROM Weather_Data ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Flight_Records WHERE Flight_Status = 'Delayed';
SELECT * FROM Flying_Conditions WHERE Temperature_Range = 'Cool' AND Humidity_Range = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data WHERE Temperature > 25 ORDER BY Date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Date, Humidity FROM Weather_Data WHERE Humidity < 40 AND Temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT Date, Wind_Speed FROM Weather_Data WHERE Wind_Speed > 15 ORDER BY Wind_Speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM Flight_Records WHERE Departure_Location = 'New York' AND Destination = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT Date, Temperature_Range, Humidity_Range FROM Flying_Conditions WHERE Humidity_Range = 'Moderate';
SELECT * FROM weather_conditions;
SELECT condition_name, temperature FROM weather_conditions;
SELECT flight_id, flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules;
SELECT airport_code, city FROM airports WHERE airport_name = 'JFK';
SELECT flight_id, airport_id FROM flights WHERE condition_id = 3;
SELECT condition_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time DESC
SELECT airport_name, city FROM airports WHERE city = 'New York' OR city = 'Los Angeles'

SELECT flights.flight_id, airports.airport_code, weather_conditions.condition_name FROM flights JOIN airports ON flights.airport_id = airports.airport_id JOIN weather_conditions ON flights.condition_id = weather_conditions.condition_id
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules JOIN flights ON flight_schedules.flight_id = flights.flight_id WHERE flights.airport_id = 1 ORDER BY arrival_time ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM wind_data ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT airport_code, city, country FROM airport_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_data WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' AND arrival_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT airport_code, city, country FROM airport_data WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT flight_number, date, temperature FROM flight_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY date ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM wind_data WHERE wind_speed > 50 AND wind_direction = 'N' ORDER BY wind_speed DESC LIMIT 5;
